title: testfor如何区分小僵尸
txt_content: 服务器里我给所有僵尸设置了移速加成，大僵尸刚刚好，可是小僵尸速度会快的让玩家根本没办法打，我想到的解决方法是testfor来区分小僵尸然后给缓慢，但我试了好几种办法都分辨不了小僵尸

replies.author: TheSuncommand
replies.txt_content:
1.13-指令先用scoreboard tag检测实体NBT
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=zombie] add TZ {IsBaby:1b}
然后就可以/effect @e[tag=TZ] slowness给缓慢了
1.13+指令只需/execute as @e[type=zombie] at @s if data entity @s {IsBaby:1b} run effect give @s slowness

replies.author: Ruainbow_
replies.txt_content:
TheSuncommand 发表于 2020-1-24 06:55
1.13-指令先用scoreboard tag检测实体NBT
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=zombie] add TZ {IsBaby:1b}
然 ...
异议！
 1.13+有nbt这个目标选择器参数，无须使用复杂的if data
并且if/unless data似乎是1.14+的子命令吧？

只需要
effect give @e[type=zombie,nbt={IsBaby:1b}] slowness
即可。

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 黑茶RGO 于 2020-1-24 09:24 编辑 

高频scoreboard players tag @e[type=Zombie] Baby-zombie {IsBaby:1b}然后选择器选择@e[tag=Baby-zombie]即可
